org.sakaiproject.util

Class FormattedText

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.FormattedText
  • Deprecated. 
    use the FormattedText service instead of this cover

    @Deprecated
public class FormattedText
extends Object
    COVER FormattedText provides support for user entry of formatted text; the formatted text is HTML. This includes text formatting in user input such as bold, underline, and fonts.
